sftCalCommand Struct Reference
[Sensor Application]

#include <sensors.h>

Detailed Description

Calibration command frame, sent from the coordinator to a end/router node, commanding the node to perform a calibration.

This packet contains the data required for the calibration.

Definition at line 162 of file sensors.h.


Data Fields

u8 type
 Frame type, see CAL_CMD_FRAME.
u8 index
 Which reading is this - first or second (0 or 1)?
u8 reading [8]
 The user-entered cal reading, as asciiz string.
